reviews.text: On tap at the brewpub. Pours clear mid brown with a white head. Fruity pine aroma. Bittersweet finish. The best of the 5 beers.
330ml bottle at Beer Station, Xiamen. Pours hazy golden with a white head. Aroma of malt, Belgian yeast, spice and bread. Sweet finish.
500ml can from Yatai supermarket. Pours cloudy golden yellow with a decent head. Some mustiness and a little sweetness. Harsh bitter finish.
